Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Root/Normal
ShortDescription: Eastbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Emerald, Root, Wallace and 43rd : due to, street blockage near Root/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via Emerald, Root, Wallace and 43rd : due to, street blockage near Root/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Westbound #43 Temporary Reroute near Root/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 buses are temporarily rerouted near Root/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via LaSalle, Pershing, Wallace, Root, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Root/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 69th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus route #29 State or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
